column1: Smoque BBQ////The coleslaw is pitch perfect
column3: and very simple.  It cuts the flavor of the meat just right.  Every so often I'd swing over to the coleslaw for a moment
column4: and going back to the meat was like taking a first bite all over again
column5: and that's something you'll probably appreciate as much as I did.  The mac and cheese is great
column6: crusted with bread crumbs and dense cheese sauce
column8: and the fries are simple quality
column9: but if you pass up the ridiculously wonderful cobbler for them you'll regret it.  Get the cobbler.  The baked beans are unusual
column10: with an almost apple flavor and chunks of onion
column11: but definitely good.  They're probably not for everyone
column12: but I liked them a lot.
